headline: The Bull Case For Booking Holdings (BKNG) Could Change Following Strong Earnings and Upgraded Outlook
summary: Booking Holdings recently reported third quarter earnings, showing revenue of US$9.01 billion and net income of US$2.75 billion, along with increased full-year revenue guidance and affirmation of its US$9.60 per share quarterly dividend. Share repurchases and the launch of a fixed-rate senior unsecured note offering have played a material role in supporting capital returns and overall financial flexibility. We'll examine how Booking Holdings' updated financial guidance and continued capital...
